Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: ミーシャ
Entry.EnglishText: Misha

Entry.JapaneseText: キュリア
Entry.EnglishText: Curia

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Agarte>
Entry.EnglishText: <Agarte>

Entry.JapaneseText: ザピィ
Entry.EnglishText: Zapie

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: ミナール
Entry.EnglishText: Minal

Entry.JapaneseText: ミナール・宿屋・客室
Entry.EnglishText: Minal - Inn - Guest Room

Entry.JapaneseText: ……はい、おしまい。
Entry.EnglishText: ...There, that should do it.

Entry.JapaneseText: おつかれさまです、 キュリア先生。
Entry.EnglishText: Thanks for coming to the rescue, Doctor Curia.

Entry.JapaneseText: 何があったかは知らないけど、 ずいぶん衰弱してるわね。 体も冷たいし、唇の色も悪い。
Entry.EnglishText: I don't know what happened, but she's incredibly weak. Her temperature is low and her lips are pale.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも命に別状はないわ。 しばらく温かくして 横になっていれば すぐに回復するわよ。
Entry.EnglishText: But she's not in critical condition. As long as she's kept warm and gets plenty of rest, I expect that she'll make a full recovery.

Entry.JapaneseText: そうですか。
Entry.EnglishText: I see.

Entry.JapaneseText: よかったネ。
Entry.EnglishText: That's great!

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ…… では、行こうか。
Entry.EnglishText: Yes... Well, let's be off.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……しかし……
Entry.EnglishText: But...

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺たちは、ここで時間を とられるわけにはいかない。
Entry.EnglishText: We don't have the luxury of wasting time here.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ああ…… そうだが……
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah... You're right, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: いいんだ、行こう。
Entry.EnglishText: It's fine, let's go.

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたたち、 どこに行くの？
Entry.EnglishText: Where are you three going?

Entry.JapaneseText: 先を急ぐので、 これで失礼します。
Entry.EnglishText: We're in a hurry, so if you'll excuse us...

Entry.JapaneseText: ちょっと、この子は!?
Entry.EnglishText: Wait, what about the girl!?

Entry.JapaneseText: 元気になったら、好きなように させてやってください。
Entry.EnglishText: When she recovers, please let her do as she wishes.

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたたちの 連れじゃないの？
Entry.EnglishText: Is she not your companion?

Entry.JapaneseText: 雪の中に倒れていた娘を助けた。 ……それだけの関係です。
Entry.EnglishText: We helped her after finding her passed out in the snow. That's the extent of our connection.

Entry.JapaneseText: 申し訳ありませんが、 後はあなたにお任せします。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm truly sorry to inconvenience you, but she's in your hands now.

Entry.JapaneseText: ちょっと、あなたたち。
Entry.EnglishText: Now wait just a minute!

Entry.JapaneseText: 先生、<Annie>を よろしくネ♪
Entry.EnglishText: Doctor, please take good care of <Annie>♪

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>……ですって？
Entry.EnglishText: Her name is...<Annie>?

Entry.JapaneseText: なるほど…… あなたが彼女の言ってた <Veigue>だったのね……
Entry.EnglishText: I see... So you're the <Veigue> she was talking about.

Entry.JapaneseText: それで、クレアは……
Entry.EnglishText: So about Claire...

Entry.JapaneseText: 答える前に、教えてくれない？ あなたたちは、何者なの？ 今、何が起こってるっていうの？
Entry.EnglishText: Before I tell you, would you mind explaining yourselves to me? Who are you people, and just what on earth is going on?

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたたち、ちょっと 普通じゃないわよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Something isn't right here.

Entry.JapaneseText: こんなにも衰弱した子を連れて来て おいて、すぐに出ていっちゃうし、 あのクレアって子もただ事じゃない 様子だったし……
Entry.EnglishText: You drop off a half dead girl into my care and then bolt to the exit. Thinking back on it...Claire's situation was strange as well.

Entry.JapaneseText: ちゃんと説明してもらわないと 話もできないわ。
Entry.EnglishText: Unless you can explain to me what's going on, I'm not telling you anything.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……話すしかないようだな。
Entry.EnglishText: ...Then we have no choice but to come clean.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……そう、あのクレアって子、 <Blue>王の盾<White>に……
Entry.EnglishText: So, Claire was kidnapped by the <Blue>Royal Shield<White>...

Entry.JapaneseText: それに、この子…… やっぱり、ドクター・バースの 娘さんだったのね。
Entry.EnglishText: And this girl here... She's the daughter of Doctor Barrs, isn't she?

Entry.JapaneseText: バースを知っているんですか？
Entry.EnglishText: You knew Barrs?

Entry.JapaneseText: 研修医だった頃に、講義を受けたわ。 ドクターは、<Annie>の…… この子の話もよくされていたわ。
Entry.EnglishText: I was a medical student of his. He spoke about <Annie> all the time.

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたが、そのドクターを…… 本当なの……？
Entry.EnglishText: About the Doctor... Is it true you...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……何か事情があるのね？ その事は、無理には聞かないわ……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm assuming there's more to the story? I won't pry any further...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……それより、クレアは!? どうしてあんたのところへ来たんだ？ 病気だったのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Going back to Claire, what happened? Why did she come to you? Was she sick!?

Entry.JapaneseText: ケガをしたって、 兵隊さんに連れられて来たけど、 ほんのかすり傷だったわ。 消毒しておしまい。
Entry.EnglishText: She was brought here by a soldier because she was hurt, but it was just a scratch. I applied some disinfectant and that was that.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……クレアは、あんたに 何か言ってなかったか？
Entry.EnglishText: Did she say anything to you!?

Entry.JapaneseText: ええ、あなたに伝言を 頼まれたわ。
Entry.EnglishText: Yes, she gave me a message to pass onto you.

Entry.JapaneseText: 伝言？
Entry.EnglishText: A message?

Entry.JapaneseText: 「船には乗らない」
Entry.EnglishText: "Don't travel by sea."

Entry.JapaneseText: 船には乗らない……？ 他には？
Entry.EnglishText: "Don't travel by sea...?"

Entry.JapaneseText: 兵隊さんの監視が厳しくて、 それだけ話すのがやっとだったわ。
Entry.EnglishText: She had an armed escort who was watching her like a hawk, so that's about the only thing she was able to tell me.

Entry.JapaneseText: クレア……
Entry.EnglishText: Claire...

Entry.JapaneseText: サレたちは他の街でも、 ヒューマの娘を集めようと しているのかもしれない。
Entry.EnglishText: Saleh may be trying to round up Huma girls from other towns as well.

Entry.JapaneseText: そう考えれば、海ではなく 陸路を移動して、別の街に 向かっている事も説明できる。
Entry.EnglishText: If so, then it would be safe to assume they are traveling by land rather than by sea, and are heading towards another city.

Entry.JapaneseText: それをクレアさんは ボクたちに伝えてくれた。 ……つくづくクレアさんって 強い人なんだね……
Entry.EnglishText: So that's what her message meant. ...Claire's really got her wits about her, hasn't she?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>王の盾<White>は、女の子をさらって 何をするつもりなの？
Entry.EnglishText: What are the <Blue>Royal Shield<White> hoping to achieve by abducting girls?

Entry.JapaneseText: わからない。 だが、そんな事はどうだっていい。 オレは一刻も早く、 クレアを助けたいんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: I don't know and I don't care. I just want to rescue Claire as soon as possible!

Entry.JapaneseText: 行こう。
Entry.EnglishText: Let's go.

Entry.JapaneseText: うん！ もう船も必要ないしネ。
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah! And I guess we don't need to worry about a ship anymore.

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ……
Entry.EnglishText: Indeed.

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたは…… このままでいいの？
Entry.EnglishText: Are you okay with leaving like this?

Entry.JapaneseText: んんっ……
Entry.EnglishText: Hngh...

Entry.JapaneseText: ここは……
Entry.EnglishText: Where am I...?

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたたち……!!
Entry.EnglishText: You people!

Entry.JapaneseText: 痛ッ……
大丈夫ですか!?
Entry.EnglishText: Are you all right!?

Entry.JapaneseText: 触らないで!!
Entry.EnglishText: Don't touch me!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>!? ミーシャはずっとキミを 看病してくれてたんだよ！ どうして？
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>! Misha has been taking care of you this entire time! What's wrong!?

Entry.JapaneseText: いやっ!! ガジュマに触られたくないの!! わたしに近寄らないで…… 来ないで……来ないでッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: No! I don't want some Gajuma touching me! Don't come near me... Stay away!

Entry.JapaneseText: 来ないで……って…… そ、そんな……ぼく…… ぼく……！
Entry.EnglishText: Stay...away? N-No, but... I...!

Entry.JapaneseText: うわぁぁぁぁぁぁッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: AAAAAAAHHH!

Entry.JapaneseText: ミーシャ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Misha!

Entry.JapaneseText: ねえ、<Annie>。 どうしてあんなコト言ったの？ ガジュマもヒューマも、 同じ<Yellow>ヒト<White>でしょ？
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>, why would you say that to another <Yellow>Human<White> being? Aren't Huma and Gajuma all the same?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……イヤなものはイヤなの。
Entry.EnglishText: ...I dislike what I dislike.

Entry.JapaneseText: どうして？
Entry.EnglishText: But, why?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……<Eugene>に…… 父親を殺されたからか？ だから、すべてのガジュマが憎いか？
Entry.EnglishText: Is it...because <Eugene> killed your dad? Do you hate all Gajuma because of that?

Entry.JapaneseText: そうなの？
Entry.EnglishText: Well, do you?

Entry.JapaneseText: わたしと同じ立場になれば 誰だって……
Entry.EnglishText: Anyone who went through what I did would understand...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……もし犯人がヒューマだったら どうしていた？
Entry.EnglishText: ...What would you think if the person who killed him was a Huma?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……そんなコトより、 ボク、ミーシャが気になる！ あの様子、普通じゃなかったヨ！ ねえ、行こうよ！
Entry.EnglishText: ...Not to change the subject, but I'm worried about Misha. That reaction wasn't normal! We've gotta go after him!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>……
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ああ。
Entry.EnglishText: ...It's fine.

Entry.JapaneseText: ミーシャの具合は いかがですか？
Entry.EnglishText: How is Misha doing?

Entry.JapaneseText: よく寝てるわ…… ゆっくり休めば大丈夫。
Entry.EnglishText: He's sleeping well. As long as he gets plenty of rest, he'll be okay.

Entry.JapaneseText: ひと安心だな。
Entry.EnglishText: That's a relief.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ああ。
Entry.EnglishText: ...Yeah.

Entry.JapaneseText: ミーシャの心配も大事だけど、 <Eugene>は大丈夫なの!? さっき、バイラスの攻撃を まともに受けてたみたいだけど……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm glad Misha's okay, but what about you, <Eugene>? It looked like you took a direct hit from that Birus earlier...

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、平気だ。 この程度の傷、すぐに治る。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm fine. A minor injury like that will heal in no time.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……それにしても、 恐ろしい世の中に なってきたわね。
Entry.EnglishText: ...I must say, our world certainly is becoming a frightening place.

Entry.JapaneseText: 恐ろしい？
Entry.EnglishText: Frightening?

Entry.JapaneseText: 何がきっかけで、 誰が暴走するのかわからない。 再び……<Blue>ラドラスの落日<White>が 起こる可能性だってあるのよ……
Entry.EnglishText: You never know when one's Force is about to go berserk, or why. Something like the <Blue>Dusk of Ladras<White> could potentially happen again.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……この国の偉い人たちが一体、 何を考えてるのか、わからない。 でも、このまま放っておけば、取り返しの つかない事になるような気がするわ。
Entry.EnglishText: I have no idea what those in charge of this Kingdom are thinking, but what I do know is that if things carry on the way they are, there will be no going back.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……行くか。
Entry.EnglishText: Let's go.

Entry.JapaneseText: 気をつけて…… 私にできる事は多くはないけど、 力が必要な時はいつでもここに来て。
Entry.EnglishText: Take care of yourselves. I can't offer much now, but if you ever need my help, please don't hesitate to stop by.

Entry.JapaneseText: うん、ありがとう!!
Entry.EnglishText: Sure thing! Thanks!

Entry.JapaneseText: それから、 <Annie>の事だけど……
Entry.EnglishText: By the way, about <Annie>...

Entry.JapaneseText: 彼女の事は俺に責任があります。 責めないでやってください。
Entry.EnglishText: She is my responsibility. Please don't blame her.

Entry.JapaneseText: 責めるつもりはないわ。 でも、このままじゃあまりにも……
Entry.EnglishText: I have no intention to, but just leaving her be seems rather...

Entry.JapaneseText: ええ……俺にできるものなら、 なんとかしたいのですが……
Entry.EnglishText: It is. I would like to do more myself, but I'm unsure what exactly...

Entry.JapaneseText: そうね……
Entry.EnglishText: I see...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……では、失礼します。
Entry.EnglishText: ...Well, we should head out.

Entry.JapaneseText: 手を見せてくれる？
Entry.EnglishText: All right, show me your hand.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……手袋の下、凍り始めてるわね。 フォルスのせいよね……？
Entry.EnglishText: ...The skin underneath your glove has started freezing over. I take it this is because of your Force?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……原因は想像つくけど。 その事、みんなには相談したの？
Entry.EnglishText: ...Though I can imagine why. Have you mentioned this to the others?

Entry.JapaneseText: 何を？
Entry.EnglishText: Mentioned what?

Entry.JapaneseText: 何をじゃないわよ。 自分の手が凍るなんて……
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>, please! Your hands are freezing over...

Entry.JapaneseText: 放っておけば、 大変な事になるわよ。
Entry.EnglishText: If you keep ignoring it, it's bound to get worse.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……だったら……だったら クレアを元に戻す方法を 教えてくれ。
Entry.EnglishText: Then... Then tell me how I can get Claire back to normal.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……陛下のフォルスで 元に戻す以外に、方法は ないんじゃないかしら？
Entry.EnglishText: ...Aside from Her Majesty's own Force, I doubt there is any other way.

Entry.JapaneseText: それができれば、 とっくにやっている!!
Entry.EnglishText: As if I wasn't trying to get her to do that for me in the first place!

Entry.JapaneseText: 今のオレには…… アガーテがどこにいるのかさえ わからないんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: But right now...I don't even know where the hell Agarte is!

Entry.JapaneseText: あ、あの…… <Veigue>さん……
Entry.EnglishText: E-Excuse me, <Veigue>...

Entry.JapaneseText: 昨日、港でもめごとがあって、 その時……クレアさん……が 止めてくれました。
Entry.EnglishText: There was a fight down at the harbor yesterday, and the one who helped me put an end to it was...Claire.

Entry.JapaneseText: まだ…… 街にいるかもしれません。
Entry.EnglishText: So, she might still be in the city somewhere.

Entry.JapaneseText: ちょっと、<Veigue>！
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>, wait!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>…… やっぱり、今のままの私じゃ…… ダメなの……？
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>... I'm...no good like this, am I?

Entry.JapaneseText: ダメ……なのよね……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm...no good like this...

Entry.JapaneseText: 苦しめて、ごめんね…… 今まで、ありがとう……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm sorry for making you suffer... And, thank you for everything...
Entry.Notes: line broke it down to two lines because it obscures Claire's face with three.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……さよなら……
Entry.EnglishText: ...Goodbye!

Entry.JapaneseText: クレア!?
Entry.EnglishText: Claire?!

Entry.JapaneseText: キキキキ…… キキ……
Entry.EnglishText: Kikikiki... Kiki...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ザピィ……？ オレは一体……？
Entry.EnglishText: Zapie... What happened to me?

Entry.JapaneseText: クレア……！
Entry.EnglishText: Claire...!

Entry.JapaneseText: ここは……ミナール？ どうして……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm in...Minal? How?

Entry.JapaneseText: ぼ、ぼくは 大丈夫ですから……
Entry.EnglishText: I-I'm fine.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>さん、 気にしないでください……
Entry.EnglishText: Please don't worry about me, Miss <Annie>.

Entry.JapaneseText: ぼくは、キュリア先生みたいな 立派なお医者さんを 目指してるんです！
Entry.EnglishText: I'm going to become a splendid doctor, just like Dr. Curia!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>さん、どっちが 先にお医者さんになるか、 競争しましょう！
Entry.EnglishText: Well, <Annie>, why don't we see who'll become a doctor first?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>さんっていう ライバルもできたし……
Entry.EnglishText: Now that <Annie>'s my new rival...

Entry.JapaneseText: 前以上にがんばろうっていう 気持ちが強くなった気がします。
Entry.EnglishText: I feel like I'm going to work harder than ever before!

Entry.JapaneseText: キュリア先生といると、 周りのガジュマの目が なぜか冷たいんです。
Entry.EnglishText: It feels like the Gajuma around me have been giving me cold stares whenever I'm with Doctor Curia.

Entry.JapaneseText: 今までそんな事、 ほとんどなかったのに……
Entry.EnglishText: That wasn't the case before. though...

Entry.JapaneseText: ボク、クレアさんに 会ったんです。
Entry.EnglishText: I met Claire.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマとヒューマのケンカを 止めるのを手伝ってくれたんですよ。
Entry.EnglishText: She helped me put a stop to a fight between the Huma and Gajuma.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>さん、顔色が あまり良くないですよ…… 無理しないでくださいね。
Entry.EnglishText: Mr. <Veigue>? Your face looks really pale... Please don't overexert yourself.

Entry.JapaneseText: 地面が…… 揺れてる……？
Entry.EnglishText: The ground's...shaking...?

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだかよくわかんないけど 不安な気持ちで いっぱいなんです……
Entry.EnglishText: I don't know why, but I feel really, really anxious.

Entry.JapaneseText: よくない事が起こる…… そんな予感がして……
Entry.EnglishText: It's as though something bad is going to happen...

Entry.JapaneseText: ボクも医者になる勉強を してるんです…… 大変だけどやりがいがあります。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm also studying to become a doctor... It's hard, but worthwhile!

Entry.JapaneseText: わたしは悪くない…… わたしは……何も……
Entry.EnglishText: I...It's not my fault... I didn't do anything wrong...

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたは……ミーシャに 近づかないでちょうだい……
Entry.EnglishText: Can you please...stay away from Misha...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ミーシャの事なら、 心配いらないわ。
Entry.EnglishText: There's no need for you to worry about Misha.

Entry.JapaneseText: 相変わらずの ガジュマ嫌いみたいね……
Entry.EnglishText: It seems like you still hate Gajuma, huh...?

Entry.JapaneseText: もう一度、お父さんが日ごろ、 どんな事を言っていたか、 思い出してみたら？
Entry.EnglishText: Try and remember what your father would always say.

Entry.JapaneseText: どこも具合、悪くない？ もし、身体の異状を感じたら、 すぐにうちへいらっしゃい。
Entry.EnglishText: Are you all right? Do you hurt anywhere? If you ever feel off, don't be afraid to pay me a visit.

Entry.JapaneseText: 最近はどう？ 医者になるには 勉強、勉強、よ。
Entry.EnglishText: How have you been doing? It'll take a lot of studying before you can become a doctor.

Entry.JapaneseText: 一人前の医者になれるよう、 応援してるわ。
Entry.EnglishText: I'll be cheering for you on your journey to become a fully-fledged doctor.

Entry.JapaneseText: 私が言うのもなんだけど…… <Annie>の事、お願いします……
Entry.EnglishText: It's not my place to say this, but please take care of <Annie>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 聖獣の力は もう全部集まったの？
Entry.EnglishText: Have you finally managed to gather all of the Sacred Beasts' power?

Entry.JapaneseText: すべてはあなたたちの肩に かかってるんだから…… がんばって……！
Entry.EnglishText: Everything rests upon your shoulders, so don't give up!

Entry.JapaneseText: 浄化はもう終わったのよね？
Entry.EnglishText: The purification's supposed to be finished, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、街の中は以前にも 増してゴタゴタしてる。 どうなってるの……？
Entry.EnglishText: But it looks like the city's in more disarray than before. What on earth is happening?

Entry.JapaneseText: あなた…… 少し落ち着きなさい。 何をそんなに焦ってるの？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey... Slow down! What are you in a hurry for?

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたたち…… <Veigue>の事、 少し気にかけてあげて……
Entry.EnglishText: Please keep <Veigue> in your thoughts...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>、くれぐれも 無理はしないで……いいわね。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>, please don't push yourself, all right?

Entry.JapaneseText: 何……？ この地鳴り……？
Entry.EnglishText: What's this rumbling...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 軍が来て、 騒ぎは落ち着いたけど、 結局何も解決してない……
Entry.EnglishText: The army came and calmed the uproar, but nothing's been resolved yet...

Entry.JapaneseText: 全部、私たちの心の持ちようが 原因なんだとしたら…… 私に何ができるって言うの？
Entry.EnglishText: If everyone's feelings are the root of this problem... Then can you tell me how to help?

Entry.JapaneseText: 医者にできるのは病気や ケガの手当てをする事だけ……
Entry.EnglishText: The only thing I can do as a doctor is treat physical ailments and wounds...

Entry.JapaneseText: 心のキズを乗り越えるには 最後は自分の力しかないの……
Entry.EnglishText: When it comes to a wounded heart, you only have your own self to rely on...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>のところへ 行かなくていいのか……？
Entry.EnglishText: Aren't you going to go see <Tytree>?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『旅人のための伝言ノート』 キュリアが勝手に診察メモに使った。 中身はとっ散らかっているが、 キュリアの字はとても美しい。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Notebook - Dr. Curia commandeered this notebook for her medical examinations. Her notes are all over the place, but her handwriting is exquisite.
